title: Invitation to tender: ODINE impact evaluation

details.excerpt: The [Open Data Incubator for Europe](https://opendataincubator.eu/) (ODINE) is a 6-month incubator for open data entrepreneurs across Europe. The programme is funded with a €7.8m grant from the EU’s Horizon 2020 programme and managed by a number of consortium partners.
details.alternative_title: Invitation to tender: ODINE impact evaluation
details.content:
The Open Data Incubator for Europe (ODINE) is a 6-month incubator for open data entrepreneurs across Europe. The programme is funded with a €7.8m grant from the EU’s Horizon 2020 programme and managed by a number of consortium partners.

A full brief can be found here

Aim:

The objective of this work is to evaluate the impact of ODINE, a funding programme from Horizon 2020, on the growth of the participants involved over the duration of the project, the success of participant organisations’ business plans and to understand the benefit that open data has to the participant organisations.

The successful company will work in collaboration with the Open Data Institute (ODI) and various consortium partners (where needed) who will provide guidance and insight.

Duration: Approx. 60 days of work between 06 March 2017 and 11 May 2017.

Interested parties should submit a costed proposal to Ryan.Goodman@theodi.org by 20 February 2017 at 17:00 GMT.

related.title: Invitation to tender: ODINE website redesign and development
